revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Firebox-t10d-ft.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = WatchGuard Firebox T10-W |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = WatchGuard_Firebox_T10-W_(DS3AE3) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = WatchGuard |model = Firebox T10 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = DS3AE3 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q6G-T10W, Q6G-PCE3302 |icid = 4657A-T10W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A0815014 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);P1010; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Power |cpu1_type_rev = QorIQ |cpu1spd = 533 <!-- 533 / 1000MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U4G8F2DTR-BC; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L2006EM2I-12G; |flash2size = 1 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M16FP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8033; |eth3chip = Atheros;AR8033; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:7F |oui = 00:90:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2011.03;; |stockos = Linux;3.0.34;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, power switch, heatsink |addchip = 2-Wire RTC;Seiko;S-35390A;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;TI;MA3232C;;1;,,, Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3204T;;1;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Fitipower;FP6137E;;1;,,, 30V 4.4A P-Channel MOSFET;Sinopower;SM3095;;2;,,, 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;SiGe (Skyworks);SE2595L;;2;,,, 4 Output PCIe Gen 1/2 Synthesizer;Renesas;IDT5V41186;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 10.0.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = readwrite |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 06/30/2023 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00MRAXFQC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Senao PCE3302AN <!-- 7016A0596004 --> |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (long) |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9582; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Project:Network/Hardware Specific/WatchGuard|WatchGuard}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Freescale]] P1010 ''PowerPC'' (@533MHz) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 1MB SPI Flash, 512MB NAND Flash *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9582 (2T2R 802.11abgn) :[[Senao PCE3302AN]] (P/N: 7016A0596004) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 1.25A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/hardware%20guides/Firebox_T10_Hardware_Guide.pdf Hardware Guide] * [https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/quick_start_guides/Firebox_T10_quickstartguide.pdf Quick Start Guide]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:WatchGuard Firebox T10-W Top.jpeg|Board Top File:WatchGuard Firebox T10-W Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
